subject: New device registered
body:
Dear {{{user.preferredName}}} {{{user.familyName}}},

 A device, {{#if event.friendlyName}}"{{{event.friendlyName}}}" {{/if}}was registered to your business online banking on {{ formatDate event.created 'dd-MMMM-yyyy \'at\' HH:mm:ss z' 'en' 'US/Eastern' }}.

If this was you:

	You're good to go! We'll remember this device in the future.


If you don't want this device remembered:


	You can go to Backbase and remove it. This will help keep your account more secure.


If this wasn't you:
	Change your password right away, and check your online banking for activity
	Remove this device from your online banking


Regards, 
Backbase Bank
